title: Murder by neglect
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Crime prevention
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - Italy
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italy - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italy - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public welfare
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social workers
description: Portrays living conditions in Western Sicily - of poverty and ignorance and unemployment in some villages and the attempts made by social workers in another village to improve conditions. The question is asked, "Must unemployment be allowed to force them into crime?" If we see these things and do nothing about them, we are guilty of murder by neglect.
